taxa.comment: Macronyx capensis and Motacilla capensis were incorrectly synonomized. I couldn't use 'Macronyx capensis' for this label as at appears in the OTT, so I added s.s. (sensu stricto).
taxa.name: Macronyx capensis s.s.

sources.source: Macronyx capensis and Motacilla capensis were incorrectly synonomized
